content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We can add new pages and posts using ‘File’ above the Content Tree once we’ve double clicked so that we’re in our chosen folder. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Adding a view panel gives a tabbed view to the LHS. To move tabs out you can click and drag the tab out to move it to another part of the page. Changes are remembered and applied to your account only. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You can use templates, created by the development team, to create basic layout for pages. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":64903,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/34132ff1-27dc-4968-80d0-364bdbe3a1be/Picture9.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/34132ff1-27dc-4968-80d0-364bdbe3a1be/Picture9.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"Picture9.png\",\"name\":\"Picture9.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"34132ff1-27dc-4968-80d0-364bdbe3a1be\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":601,\"height\":464},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"To create new pages, files, folders etc. We can right-click on the content space and click ’New’ and select what you want to create.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":131597,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/e7f1f0bd-3705-43bb-b631-a5d40c8d5604/Picture10.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/e7f1f0bd-3705-43bb-b631-a5d40c8d5604/Picture10.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"Picture10.png\",\"name\":\"Picture10.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"e7f1f0bd-3705-43bb-b631-a5d40c8d5604\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":720,\"height\":630},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The title here becomes the URL so be aware of SEO (Search Engine Optimization) naming conventions etc. Capital letters get converted to lower case and spaces become hyphens when the auto URL is created.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":21893,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/3e9ee808-e9c8-4d26-90e6-c25c3151d4e0/Picture11.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/3e9ee808-e9c8-4d26-90e6-c25c3151d4e0/Picture11.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"Picture11.png\",\"name\":\"Picture11.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"3e9ee808-e9c8-4d26-90e6-c25c3151d4e0\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":601,\"height\":353},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Once you’ve created your page or post, in this case a Blog Post, we can start amending existing assets or adding new ones. Amending existing components is straight-forward because you will likely have a preset for how a given type of page is supposed to look upon creation. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":218981,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/3f662b1a-8511-462e-8b0f-e49e3d523a48/Picture12.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/3f662b1a-8511-462e-8b0f-e49e3d523a48/Picture12.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"Picture12.png\",\"name\":\"Picture12.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"3f662b1a-8511-462e-8b0f-e49e3d523a48\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1028.9931640625,\"height\":501.41932685979486},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"To save changes we’ve made to an asset, we use the blue ‘Save’ button at the top of the page.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":15480,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/bb60253e-9863-447e-8497-a48c40a68c86/Picture13.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/bb60253e-9863-447e-8497-a48c40a68c86/Picture13.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"Picture13.png\",\"name\":\"Picture13.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"bb60253e-9863-447e-8497-a48c40a68c86\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":720,\"height\":228},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Locks next to pages indicate another user is working on the page. A key icon indicates the page is unlocked to you, or locked BY you.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":18904,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/69282bce-b3bf-4c7d-ba0d-fd490a4b50ab/Picture14.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/69282bce-b3bf-4c7d-ba0d-fd490a4b50ab/Picture14.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"Picture14.png\",\"name\":\"Picture14.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"69282bce-b3bf-4c7d-ba0d-fd490a4b50ab\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":564,\"height\":88},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You can change the view at the top of the page within a page with Preview, Inline, and Form. Form view gives view of fields to add content. Inline gives you a preview and allows you to make changes too, and preview are also options.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":12739,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/cf99ab86-58d6-4aa2-954f-c4d19e5354f2/Picture15.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/cf99ab86-58d6-4aa2-954f-c4d19e5354f2/Picture15.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"Picture15.png\",\"name\":\"Picture15.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"cf99ab86-58d6-4aa2-954f-c4d19e5354f2\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":660,\"height\":234},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You can see the last published URLs using the button immediately to the left of the ‘Save’ button:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":35876,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/247bf2d4-57e4-471c-b374-27a00633c08a/Picture16.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/247bf2d4-57e4-471c-b374-27a00633c08a/Picture16.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"Picture16.png\",\"name\":\"Picture16.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"247bf2d4-57e4-471c-b374-27a00633c08a\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":720,\"height\":306},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Models are how assets are designed. They are templates with workflows and any background information or metadata that needs to be added to that type of page. They can be applied to a set folder or location or used across the site. Models are set up at initial implementation. They can apply workflow and put new pages into a specified workflow state too.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
